cancelDraftCampaign(uint256).details: Only the campaign owner can cancel their campaignCampaign must be in draft status to be cancelledChanges campaign status to CancelledEmits CampaignCancelled event upon successful cancellation

params._id: The ID of the campaign to cancel

constructor.details: Sets the deployer as the contract owner using OpenZeppelin's Ownable

createDraft((string,string,uint256,uint2.details: Validates input parameters using CampaignLib functions and initializes campaign in Draft statusEmits CampaignCreated event upon successful creation

params.input: The campaign input data containing title, description, target, deadline, image, category, and withdrawal settings

returns._0: The ID of the newly created campaign

createPublishedCampaign((string,string,u.details: Validates input parameters and requires an image to be providedInitializes campaign in Published status, making it immediately available for donationsEmits CampaignCreated event upon successful creation

params.input: The campaign input data containing title, description, target, deadline, image, category, and withdrawal settings

returns._0: The ID of the newly created and published campaign

donateToCampaign(uint256).details: Campaign must be published and not past its deadlineDonation amount must be greater than zeroUpdates donor information and campaign collected amountIncrements donor count for first-time donorsEmits CampaignDonated event upon successful donation

params._id: The ID of the campaign to donate to

getActiveCampaigns((uint256,uint256)).details: Only returns campaigns that are published and have not reached their deadlineActive means: status == Published AND deadline > block.timestamp

getCampaign(uint256,bool).details: Reverts with CampaignNotPublished if publishedOnly is true and campaign is not published

params._id: The ID of the campaign to retrieve
params.publishedOnly: If true, only returns published campaigns

getCampaignById(uint256).details: Returns campaign regardless of status (draft, published, or cancelled)

params._id: The ID of the campaign to retrieve

returns._0: The address of the campaign owner
The campaign status (Draft, Published, or Cancelled)

getCampaigns().details: Returns campaigns in order of creation (by ID)Includes draft, published, and cancelled campaigns

returns._0: Array of all campaign data structures

getCampaignsByCategory(uint8).details: Only returns campaigns with Published statusCategories include Technology, Art, Community, Business, Charity, Other

params._category: The category to filter campaigns by

returns._0: Array of published campaigns in the specified category

getCompletedCampaigns((uint256,uint256)).details: Only returns campaigns that are published and have reached their deadlineCompleted means: status == Published AND deadline <= block.timestamp

returns._0: The number of unique addresses that have donated to this campaign

getDonorInfo(uint256,address).details: Reverts with NoDonationsMade if the donor has never donated to this campaign

returns.amount: The total amount donated by this donor
returns.noOfDonations: The number of separate donations made by this donor
returns.timestamp: The timestamp of the donor's last donation

getPublishedCampaigns((uint256,uint256)).details: Only returns campaigns with Published statusUseful for frontend pagination to avoid loading all campaigns at once

returns._campaigns: Array of published campaigns within the specified range
returns.total: Total number of published campaigns available

getPublishedCampaignsUnpaginated().details: Alternative to getPublishedCampaigns for simpler use casesOnly returns campaigns with Published statusConsider using getPublishedCampaigns with pagination for large datasets

returns._0: The amount available for withdrawal (collected - withdrawn)

getUserActiveCampaigns(address).details: Only returns campaigns with Published status and deadline > current timestampUseful for showing a user's campaigns that are currently accepting donations

params._owner: The address of the campaign owner

returns._0: Array of active campaigns owned by the specified address

getUserCampaigns(address).details: Returns campaigns regardless of status (draft, published, cancelled)Useful for user dashboard to show all their campaigns

params._owner: The address of the campaign owner

returns._0: Array of campaigns owned by the specified address

getUserDraftCampaigns(address).details: Only returns campaigns with Draft statusUseful for user dashboard to show campaigns that can still be edited

params._owner: The address of the campaign owner

returns._0: Array of draft campaigns owned by the specified address

getUserPublishedCampaigns(address).details: Only returns campaigns with Published statusUseful for displaying a user's active fundraising campaigns

params._owner: The address of the campaign owner

returns._0: Array of published campaigns owned by the specified address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

publishCampaign(uint256).details: Only the campaign owner can publish their campaignCampaign must be in draft status and have an imageChanges campaign status to PublishedEmits CampaignPublished event upon successful publication

params._id: The ID of the campaign to publish

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateDraftCampaign((uint256,string,stri.details: Only the campaign owner can update their campaignCampaign must be in draft status to be updatedValidates all input parameters using CampaignLib functionsEmits CampaignUpdated event upon successful update

params.input: The campaign update data containing id, title, description, target, deadline, image, and category

withdrawCampaignFunds(uint256).details: Only the campaign owner can withdraw fundsWithdrawal conditions are checked by CampaignLib.canWithdraw()For campaigns without flexible withdrawal: must be past deadlineMust have sufficient balance (collected > withdrawn)Updates withdrawn amount and transfers ETH to campaign ownerEmits FundsWithdrawn event upon successful withdrawal

params._id: The ID of the campaign to withdraw funds from

campaignDonors(uint256,address).notice: Mapping of campaign ID to donor address to donor information

campaigns(uint256).notice: Mapping of campaign ID to campaign data

cancelDraftCampaign(uint256).notice: Cancels a draft campaign, preventing it from being published

createDraft((string,string,uint256,uint2.notice: Creates a new campaign in draft status that can be edited before publishing

createPublishedCampaign((string,string,u.notice: Creates a new campaign and immediately publishes it for donations

getActiveCampaigns((uint256,uint256)).notice: Retrieves active published campaigns with pagination

getCampaign(uint256,bool).notice: Retrieves campaign information by ID with optional published-only filter

getCampaignById(uint256).notice: Retrieves campaign information by ID without any filters

getCampaignOwner(uint256).notice: Gets the owner address of a campaign

getCampaignStatus(uint256).notice: Gets the current status of a campaign

getCampaigns().notice: Retrieves all campaigns regardless of status

getCampaignsByCategory(uint8).notice: Retrieves all published campaigns in a specific category

getCompletedCampaigns((uint256,uint256)).notice: Retrieves completed published campaigns with pagination

getDonorCount(uint256).notice: Gets the total number of unique donors for a campaign

getDonorInfo(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves donation information for a specific donor and campaign

getPublishedCampaigns((uint256,uint256)).notice: Retrieves published campaigns with pagination support

getPublishedCampaignsUnpaginated().notice: Retrieves all published campaigns without pagination

getRemainingBalance(uint256).notice: Calculates the remaining withdrawable balance for a campaign

getUserActiveCampaigns(address).notice: Retrieves all active campaigns created by a specific user

getUserCampaigns(address).notice: Retrieves all campaigns created by a specific user

getUserDraftCampaigns(address).notice: Retrieves all draft campaigns created by a specific user

getUserPublishedCampaigns(address).notice: Retrieves all published campaigns created by a specific user

publishCampaign(uint256).notice: Publishes a draft campaign, making it available for donations

updateDraftCampaign((uint256,string,stri.notice: Updates an existing draft campaign with new information

withdrawCampaignFunds(uint256).notice: Allows campaign owner to withdraw collected funds
